*   **Trade Agreements**: The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Project Context**
___________________

The Compliance Engineering, Vehicle, and Equipment Testing Division of Transport Canada is seeking proposal services to support the enforcement of compliance with Canada's Motor Vehicle Safety Act and its Regulations. This mandate requires compliance testing to be conducted at government or independent laboratories with specialized testing facilities.

**Tender Description**
____________________

The requirement consists of two parts, with up to two contracts awarded for each part. Bidders can submit proposals for either or both parts.

Part 1: involves compliance testing of new tires for motor vehicles with a Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR) exceeding 4,536 kg and motorcycles, as well as new radial ply tires for motor vehicles with a GVWR of 4,536 kg or less, in accordance with the Canada Motor Vehicle Safety Regulations (CMVSS).

Part 2: involves compliance testing of tires to the requirements outlined in the CMVSS, as well as testing to American Society for Testing and Materials (ASTM) F1805-20 standards.
